paper.title: An Iterative Approach to Language Containment
paper.abstract: We propose an iterative approach to formal verification by language containment. We start with some initial abstraction and then iteratively refine it, guided by the failure report from the verification tool. We show that the procedure will terminate, propose a series of heuristic aimed at reducing the size of BDDu0027s used in the computation, and formulate several open problems that could improve efficiency of the procedure. Finally, we present and discuss some initial experimental results.
